Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Bedroom \Bed"room\, n. 1. A room or apartment intended or used for a bed; a lodging room. [1913 Webster]
2. Room in a bed.
Note: [In this sense preferably {bed room}.] [1913 Webster]
Then by your side no bed room me deny. --Shak. [1913 Webster]

Bedroom \Bed"room\, n. 1. A room or apartment intended or used for a bed; a lodging room. [1913 Webster]

Note: [In this sense preferably {bed room}.] [1913 Webster]
Then by your side no bed room me deny. --Shak. [1913 Webster]
bedroom n : a room used primarily for sleeping [syn: {sleeping room}, {chamber}, {bedchamber}]
